data.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

data.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
data.author: Ernest Hemingway

data.quote: All the adversity I’ve had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me…. You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: There are two ways of exerting one’s strength: one is pushing down, the other is pulling up.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
data.author: Vernon Howard

data.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
data.author: LeBron James

data.quote: There are better starters than me but I’m a strong finisher.
data.author: Usain Bolt

data.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
data.author: Louisa May Alcott

data.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
data.author: Joel Osteen
